message:
Add Collections tab with starred comments and analysis features

- Create CollectionsView component with Starred Comments and Daily Pictures sections
- Replace Calendar tab with Collections in navigation
- Add Calendar and Save buttons to left toolbar (floating)
- Implement CalendarPopup modal for loading/viewing entries
- Add smooth comment expansion animations with cubic-bezier easing
- Remove caret pulse animation per user feedback

Backend Analysis Features:
- Add analyze_echoes session: find recurring themes across all notes
- Add analyze_traits session: identify personality characteristics
- Add analyze_patterns session: discover behavioral patterns
- All analysis functions use PolyCLI session_def with LLM (gpt-4o-dou)

Frontend Analysis Integration:
- Update AnalysisView with Echoes, Traits, Patterns pages
- Remove "Ask Away" page from Analysis tab
- Collect all calendar entries and send concatenated text to backend
- Display structured JSON results with custom styling per type

Comment Card Enhancements:
- Expand max width from 400px to 600px
- Change from fixed height to minHeight for vertical expansion
- Add 3-line clamp with word-wrap instead of ellipsis cutoff
- Add action toolbar (star, kill) when expanded
- Add inline chat interface in expanded cards

Other Improvements:
- Fix TypeScript errors: unused imports, unused parameters
- Exclude *.old.tsx files from TypeScript compilation
- Add calendar storage utilities with date-keyed entries
- Improve comment navigation when cards are expanded
